000000001e

00000000001     000000000000000

                0000001
                 000001
                  000011
                     0122             on
                     0122o             n
                     011
                     01
..//with this fucking dot here
//now we free to write anything bellow =]]




-----------LET'S EXPLAIN SOME ABOVE DIGITS-------------------
0 - underground brick
1 - surface with grass brick
2 - underground brick 2

3 - bush
4 - bamboo
5 - rock
6 - grass 
7 - tree

8 - monster tomato
9 - laser
a - mirror - reflector left - up
b - mirror - reflector left - down
c - mirror - reflector right - up
d - mirror - reflector right - down
e - power pole
///////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////
these following map must be put in the distance in the rule by which:

two continue bridges (or other things) must have distance from the FIRST END to the SECOND BEGIN //greater// than the maximum
indices to be displayed in map.
or else
two continue bridges (or other things) must have distance from the FIRST END to the SECOND BEGIN //smaller// than the maximum
indices to be displayed in map.


///new define
f - bridge mark 
g - pool without wood mark
h - pool with wood mark
i - white cloud valley
j - dark cloud valley


k - single gear killer
l - 2 gear killer
m - 3 gear killer

n - destination
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
